question:
You are going on a month training programme to the UK and know that the head of the course would like one of the participants to be the social events' organiser.
Write a letter to the Training Organizer. In your letter
• expressing your interest in the role
• requesting more information about it
• explaining what experience you have
text: I am writing to let you know that I am interested to be appointed as the social events organizer for next month's training program.

In line with this, I would like to request more information about this role, such as the kind of events the selected organizer is expected to put together and the spare time one will have to do the responsibilities of being an organizer.

I have had a great deal of experience organizing parties, from a casual birthday party to a black-tie event. I think this may be an opportunity for me to develop my leadership skills, as well as my social skills. Furthermore, this can also help me broaden my network by allowing me to meet and interact with more people.
If you have any questions or would like to do an interview, please feel free to contact me anytime at 070-1234-5678 or [email protected]
Thank you in advance. I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
